Object.Field: IKM Oracle Slowly Changing Dimension - Auto Behavior

COMPONENT NAME: IKM Oracle Slowly Changing Dimension
AUTHOR: Oracle
DESCRIPTION - Management of TYPE 2 Slowly Changing Dimensions on Oracle. - Data can be controlled. Invalid data is isolated in the Error Table and can be recycled.
REQUIREMENTS When defining the Target Datastore, it is necessary to set the following parameters (from the "Slowly Changing Dimensions Behavior" list box, on the "Description" tab of each column concerned): - Surrogate Key: A single column identifying Records. This column must be: - Mapped to the next value (my_schema.my_sequence.NEXTVAL) - Executed on Target - Natural Key: Column(s) representing the Natural Key of the Record. - Overwrite Column: List of updatable column(s) (i.e. those that can be updated after modification of the original data). - Insert Row: List of column(s) representing the Slowly Changing Attributes (i.e. those that require a Record insert after modification of the original data) - Current Record Flag: A single numeric column mapped to 0 or 1 and representing the Current Record Flag status of the Record. It is automatically updated by the Knowledge Module (1 : Current Record ; 0 : Past Records) - Start Timestamp: A single date (or timestamp) column indicating the beginning of a Record's availability. - End Timestamp: A single date (or timestamp) column indicating the end of the Record's availability. The value is a default of "01 January 2400"
OPTIONS (Refer to Option descriptions for more information on each option) - COMMIT: commit all inserted and/or updated data - FLOW_CONTROL: allow flow control - RECYCLE_ERRORS: allow recycling of previous rejected data - STATIC_CONTROL: allow the control on the target table after processing - TRUNCATE: allow truncate on the target datastore - DELETE_ALL: allow the deletion of all rows on the target datastore - CREATE_TARGET_TABLE: allow the creation of the target table - DELETE_TEMPORARY_OBJECTS: delete or not the temporary objects after processing. - FLOW_TABLE_OPTIONS: specify the attributes for the integration table at create time and used for increasing performance. - COMPATIBLE: RDBMS version of staging/target - VALIDATE: extra validation step for KM options - ANALYZE_TARGET: analyze the target table - OPTIMIZER_HINT: hint for loading integration table
LIMITATIONS - Make sure to map ALL target table columns flagged as: "Surrogate Key", "Natural Key", "Current Record Flag" and "End Timestamp". Notice that mappings set for the "Current Record Flag" and "End Timestamp" columns are not used. - As this Knowledge Module is dedicated to Datawarehouse Projects (where data should not be removed), when using it with a journalized Source Datastore, it is not possible to synchronize deletions. Therefore, data should be manually filtered to exclude any source delete events (add a filter on JRN_FLAG = 'I'). - The TRUNCATE option cannot work if the target table is referenced by another table (i.e. with a Foreign Key). - Deletes are committed regardless of the COMMIT option. - The option FLOW_TABLE_OPTION is set by default to NOLOGGING. Set it to white space if the Integration Interface is executed on an Oracle 7 Database. - The FLOW_CONTROL and STATIC_CONTROL options call the Check Knowledge Module to isolate invalid data (if no CKM is set, an error occurs). Both options must be set to NO in the case when an Integration Interface populates a TEMPORARY target datastore. If the Table Primary Key is designated by the same column as the Surrogate Key, then: 1. On the "Diagram" tab of the Interface, uncheck the "Check Not Null" checkbox for the column representing the Primary Key. 2. On the "Control" tab of the Interface and in the "Constraint" panel, set the option value to NO for the Primary Key control.
Commit all data inserted or updated in the target datastore.
Check this option if you wish to perform flow control.
Check this option to recycle data rejected by flow control in a previous execution of this interface.
Check this option to control the target table after having inserted or updated target data.
Check this option if you wish to truncate the target datastore.
Check this option if you wish to delete all the rows of the target datastore.
Check this option if you wish to create the target table
Set this option to NO if you wish to retain temporary objects (tables, files and scripts) after integration. Useful for debugging.

Use this option to specify the attributes for the integration table at create time and used for increasing performance. This option is set by default to NOLOGGING (valid only from Oracle v8). This option may be left empty.

This option affects the use of PURGE key word and the way statistics are collected:
Values PURGE STATS 10 Yes DBMS_STATS 9 No DBMS_STATS 8 No ANALYZE

This option generates an extra validation step during development. Validations performed are: - validation of KM option COMPATIBLE - validation of RDBMS version of staging database
This option should be turned off for all production use in particular for high-frequency execution. There is not added value in production, only processing overhead.
Check this option if you wish to analyze the target table before loading data into the integration table.
Use this option to specify the hint to be used while loading the integration table.
This option generates an extra validation step. This step check that at least one column is marked as SCD_ADD and at least another one marked as SCD_UPD.

insert into <%=odiRef.getTable("L","INT_NAME","A")%> ( <%=odiRef.getColList("", "[COL_NAME]", ",
	", ",", "(((SCD_NK or SCD_INS or SCD_UPD) and !TRG) and REW)")%> IND_UPDATE ) select DISTINCT <%=odiRef.getColList("", "[COL_NAME]", ",
	", ",", "(((SCD_NK or SCD_INS or SCD_UPD) and !TRG) and REW)")%> 'I' from <%=odiRef.getTable("L","ERR_NAME", "W")%> E where not exists ( select 'X' from <%=odiRef.getTable("L","INT_NAME","A")%> T where <%=odiRef.getColList("", "T.[COL_NAME]	= E.[COL_NAME]", "
		and	", "", "SCD_NK")%> ) and E.ODI_ORIGIN = '<%=odiRef.getInfo("CT_ORIGIN")%>' and E.ODI_ERR_TYPE = '<%=odiRef.getInfo("CT_ERR_TYPE")%>'

<% if (new Integer(odiRef.getOption( "COMPATIBLE" )).intValue() < 9 ) { %>
analyze table <%=odiRef.getTable("L","INT_NAME","A")%> estimate statistics
<% } else { %>
begin dbms_stats.gather_table_stats( ownname => '<%=odiRef.getInfo( "DEST_WORK_SCHEMA" )%>', tabname => '<%=odiRef.getTable("L","INT_NAME","A").replaceAll("","").replaceAll("..>",".replaceAll(odiRef.getInfo( \\u0022DEST_WORK_SCHEMA\\u0022 )+\\u0022.\\u0022,\\u0022\\u0022)?>")%>', estimate_percent => dbms_stats.auto_sample_size ); end;
<% }; %>

<%
       if (odiRef.getColList("", "[COL_NAME]", "", "", "(((SCD_UPD) ) and MAP)").length() == 0) 
          out.print( "Target Table must have at least one column mapped as 'Update on change' " );
%>

insert into <%=odiRef.getTable("L","TARG_NAME","A")%> ( <%=odiRef.getColList("", "[COL_NAME]", ",
	", "", "(((SCD_SK or SCD_NK or SCD_INS or SCD_UPD or (!SCD_SK and !SCD_NK and !SCD_UPD and !SCD_INS and !SCD_FLAG and !SCD_START and !SCD_END)) and !TRG) and REW)")%> <%=odiRef.getColList(",", "[COL_NAME]", ",
	", "", "(((SCD_SK or SCD_NK or SCD_INS or SCD_UPD or (!SCD_SK and !SCD_NK and !SCD_UPD and !SCD_INS and !SCD_FLAG and !SCD_START and !SCD_END)) and TRG) and REW)")%> <%=odiRef.getColList(",", "[COL_NAME]", ",
	", "", "(SCD_FLAG and REW)")%> <%=odiRef.getColList(",", "[COL_NAME]", ",
	", "", "(SCD_START and REW)")%> <%=odiRef.getColList(",", "[COL_NAME]", ",
	", "", "(SCD_END and REW)")%> ) select <%=odiRef.getColList("", "[COL_NAME]", ",
	", "", "(((SCD_SK or SCD_NK or SCD_INS or SCD_UPD or (!SCD_SK and !SCD_NK and !SCD_UPD and !SCD_INS and !SCD_FLAG and !SCD_START and !SCD_END)) and !TRG) and REW)")%> <%=odiRef.getColList(",", "[EXPRESSION]", ",
	", "", "(((SCD_SK or SCD_NK or SCD_INS or SCD_UPD or (!SCD_SK and !SCD_NK and !SCD_UPD and !SCD_INS and !SCD_FLAG and !SCD_START and !SCD_END)) and TRG) and REW)")%> <%=odiRef.getColList(",", "1", ",
	", "", "(SCD_FLAG and REW)")%> <%=odiRef.getColList(",", "[COL_NAME]", ",
	", "", "(SCD_START and REW)")%> <%=odiRef.getColList(",", "to_date ('01-01-2400', 'mm-dd-yyyy')", ",
	", "", "(SCD_END and REW)")%> from <%=odiRef.getTable("L","INT_NAME","A")%> S where S.IND_UPDATE = 'I'

update <%=odiRef.getTable("L", "INT_NAME", "A")%> S set S.IND_UPDATE = 'U' where (<%=odiRef.getColList("", "S.[COL_NAME]", ", ", "", "SCD_NK")%>) in ( select <%=odiRef.getColList("", "T.[COL_NAME]", ",", "", "SCD_NK")%> from <%=odiRef.getTable("L", "TARG_NAME", "A")%> T where <%=odiRef.getColList("", "((S.[COL_NAME] = T.[COL_NAME]) or ((S.[COL_NAME] is null) and (T.[COL_NAME] is null)))", "
		and	", "", "(SCD_INS or (!SCD_SK and !SCD_NK and !SCD_UPD and !SCD_INS and !SCD_FLAG and !SCD_START and !SCD_END)) and !TRG")%> <%=odiRef.getColList("		and	", "T.[COL_NAME]	= 1", "
		and	", "", "SCD_FLAG")%> <%=odiRef.getColList("		and	","T.[COL_NAME]	= to_date ('01-01-2400', 'mm-dd-yyyy')","
		and	","","SCD_END")%> )

<% if ("C".equals(odiRef.getJrnInfo( "JRN_METHOD"))) { %> /* Consistant journalization detected. */ /* Lock should be done by a specific step in a package */ <% } else { %> delete from <%=odiRef.getTable("L","JRN_NAME","A")%> where JRN_CONSUMED = '1' <%=odiRef.getJrnFilter()%> <% } %>

<% if (new Integer(odiRef.getOption( "COMPATIBLE" )).intValue() < 9 ) { %>
analyze table <%=odiRef.getTable("L","TARG_NAME","A")%> estimate statistics
<% } else { %>
begin dbms_stats.gather_table_stats( ownname => '<%=odiRef.getInfo( "DEST_SCHEMA" )%>', tabname => '<%=odiRef.getTable("L","TARG_NAME","A").replaceAll("","").replaceAll("..>",".replaceAll( \\u0022(\\u0022+(char)92+\\u0022Q\\u0022 + odiRef.getInfo( \\u0022DEST_SCHEMA\\u0022 )+ (char)92+\\u0022E|\\u0022 + (char)92 + \\u0022Q\\u0022 + odiRef.getInfo( \\u0022DEST_WORK_SCHEMA\\u0022 )+ (char)92 + \\u0022E).\\u0022,\\u0022\\u0022)?>")%>', estimate_percent => dbms_stats.auto_sample_size ); end;
<% }; %>

<%
       if (odiRef.getColList("", "[COL_NAME]", "", "", "(((SCD_INS) ) and MAP)").length() == 0) 
          out.print( "Target Table must have at least one column mapped as 'Insert on change' " );
%>

<% if (odiRef.getColList("", "A", "", "", "(SCD_UPD and REW)").length()>0) { %> update <%=odiRef.getTable("L", "TARG_NAME", "A")%> T set ( <%=odiRef.getColList("", "T.[COL_NAME]", ",
	", "", "(((SCD_UPD) and !TRG) and REW)")%> <%=odiRef.getColList(",", "T.[COL_NAME]", ",
	", "", "(((SCD_UPD) and TRG) and REW)")%> ) = ( select <%=odiRef.getColList("", "X.[COL_NAME]",",
			","","(((SCD_UPD) and !TRG) and REW)")%> <%=odiRef.getColList(",", "[EXPRESSION]",",
			","","(((SCD_UPD) and TRG) and REW)")%> from <%=odiRef.getTable("L", "INT_NAME", "A")%> X where <%=odiRef.getColList("", "X.[COL_NAME]	= T.[COL_NAME]", "
		and	", "", "SCD_NK")%> and X.IND_UPDATE = 'U' ) where (<%=odiRef.getColList("", "T.[COL_NAME]", ", ", "", "SCD_NK")%>) in ( select <%=odiRef.getColList("", "S.[COL_NAME]", ", ", "", "SCD_NK")%> from <%=odiRef.getTable("L", "INT_NAME", "A")%> S where S.IND_UPDATE = 'U' ) <%=odiRef.getColList("and	", "T.[COL_NAME]	= 1", "
and	", "", "SCD_FLAG")%> <%=odiRef.getColList("and	","[COL_NAME]	= to_date ('01-01-2400', 'mm-dd-yyyy')","
and	","","SCD_END")%> <%}%>

update <%=odiRef.getTable("L","TARG_NAME","A")%> T set ( <%=odiRef.getColList("", "T.[COL_NAME]", ",
	", "", "(SCD_FLAG and REW)")%> <%if ((odiRef.getColList("", "A", "", "", "(SCD_FLAG and REW)").length() != 0) && (odiRef.getColList("", "B", "", "", "(SCD_END and REW)").length() != 0)){out.print(" ,");}%> <%=odiRef.getColList("", "T.[COL_NAME]", ",
	", "", "(SCD_END and REW)")%> ) = ( select <%=odiRef.getColList("", "0", ",
			", "", "(SCD_FLAG and REW)")%> <%if ((odiRef.getColList("", "A", "", "", "(SCD_FLAG and REW)").length() != 0) && (odiRef.getColList("", "B", "", "", "(SCD_END and REW)").length() != 0)){out.print(" ,");}%> <%if (odiRef.getColList("", "C", "", "", "(SCD_END and REW)").length() != 0){ out.print(odiRef.getColList("			", "S.[COL_NAME]", ",
			", "", "(SCD_START and REW)")); } %> from <%=odiRef.getTable("L","INT_NAME","A")%> S where <%=odiRef.getColList("", "S.[COL_NAME]	= T.[COL_NAME]", "
		and	", "", "SCD_NK")%> and S.IND_UPDATE = 'I' ) where (<%=odiRef.getColList("", "T.[COL_NAME]", ", ", "", "(SCD_NK)")%>) in ( select <%=odiRef.getColList("", "X.[COL_NAME]", ", ", "", "(SCD_NK)")%> from <%=odiRef.getTable("L","INT_NAME","A")%> X where X.IND_UPDATE = 'I' ) <%=odiRef.getColList("and	", "T.[COL_NAME]	= 1", "
and	", "", "(SCD_FLAG)")%> <%=odiRef.getColList("and	","[COL_NAME]	= to_date ('01-01-2400', 'mm-dd-yyyy')","
and	","","SCD_END")%>

create table <%=odiRef.getTable("L", "INT_NAME", "A")%> ( <%=odiRef.getColList("", "[COL_NAME]\t[DEST_WRI_DT] null", ",\n\t", ",", "")%> <% if (odiRef.getColList("", "A", "", "", "SCD_START").length() == 0) { %> <%=odiRef.getTargetColList("", "[COL_NAME]\t[DEST_WRI_DT] null", ",\n\t", ",", "SCD_START AND REW") %> <% } %> IND_UPDATE CHAR(1) ) <%=odiRef.getUserExit("FLOW_TABLE_OPTIONS")%>

<% if (new Integer(odiRef.getOption( "COMPATIBLE" )).intValue() < 9 ) { %>
analyze table <%=odiRef.getTable("L","TARG_NAME","A")%> estimate statistics
<% } else { %>
begin dbms_stats.gather_table_stats( ownname => '<%=odiRef.getInfo( "DEST_SCHEMA" )%>', tabname => '<%=odiRef.getTable("L","TARG_NAME","A").replaceAll("","").replaceAll("..>",".replaceAll( \\u0022(\\u0022+(char)92+\\u0022Q\\u0022 + odiRef.getInfo( \\u0022DEST_SCHEMA\\u0022 )+ (char)92+\\u0022E|\\u0022 + (char)92 + \\u0022Q\\u0022 + odiRef.getInfo( \\u0022DEST_WORK_SCHEMA\\u0022 )+ (char)92 + \\u0022E).\\u0022,\\u0022\\u0022)?>")%>', estimate_percent => dbms_stats.auto_sample_size ); end;
<% }; %>

<% if ("C".equals(odiRef.getJrnInfo( "JRN_METHOD"))) { %> /* Consistant journalization detected. */ /* Lock should be done by a specific step in a package */ <% } else { %> update <%=odiRef.getTable( "L" , "JRN_NAME" , "A" )%> set JRN_CONSUMED = '1' where (1=1) <%=odiRef.getJrnFilter()%> <% } %>

insert /*+ APPEND */ into <%=odiRef.getTable("L","INT_NAME","A")%> ( <%=odiRef.getColList("", "[COL_NAME]", ",
	", ",", "(((SCD_NK or SCD_INS or SCD_UPD or (!SCD_SK and !SCD_NK and !SCD_UPD and !SCD_INS and !SCD_FLAG and !SCD_START and !SCD_END) ) and !TRG) and REW)")%> <%=odiRef.getColList("", "[COL_NAME]", ",
	", ",", "(SCD_START and REW)")%> IND_UPDATE )
select * from ( <%for (int i=odiRef.getDataSetMin(); i <= odiRef.getDataSetMax(); i++){%> <%=odiRef.getDataSet(i, "Operator")%> select <%=odiRef.getOption("OPTIMIZER_HINT")%> <%=odiRef.getPop("DISTINCT_ROWS")%> <%=odiRef.getColList(i,"", "[EXPRESSION]	[COL_NAME]", ",
	", ",", "(((SCD_NK or SCD_INS or SCD_UPD or (!SCD_SK and !SCD_NK and !SCD_UPD and !SCD_INS and !SCD_FLAG and !SCD_START and !SCD_END)) and !TRG) and REW)")%> <% if (odiRef.getColList(i,"", "D", "", "", "(SCD_START and REW)").length() != 0){ if (odiRef.getColList(i,"", "[EXPRESSION]", ",
	", ",", "(SCD_START and REW)").length() != 0) { out.print(odiRef.getColList(i,"", "[EXPRESSION]	[COL_NAME]", ",
	", ",", "(SCD_START and REW)")); } else { out.print(odiRef.getColList(i,"", "sysdate", ",
	", ",", "(SCD_START and REW)")); } } %> <% if (odiRef.getDataSet(i, "HAS_JRN").equals("1")) { %> JRN_FLAG IND_UPDATE <%} else {%> 'I' IND_UPDATE <%}%> from <%=odiRef.getFrom(i)%> where (1=1) <%=odiRef.getJoin(i)%> <%=odiRef.getFilter(i)%> <%=odiRef.getJrnFilter(i)%> <%=odiRef.getGrpBy(i)%> <%=odiRef.getHaving(i)%> <%}%> ) S where NOT EXISTS ( select 'x' from <%=odiRef.getTable("L","TARG_NAME","A")%> T where <%=odiRef.getColList("","T.[COL_NAME]	= S.[COL_NAME]", "
	and	", "", "SCD_NK")%> <%=odiRef.getColList("and	","((S.[COL_NAME] = T.[COL_NAME]) or (S.[COL_NAME] IS NULL and T.[COL_NAME] IS NULL))", "
		and	", "", "((SCD_UPD OR SCD_INS or (!SCD_SK and !SCD_NK and !SCD_UPD and !SCD_INS and !SCD_FLAG and !SCD_START and !SCD_END)) AND REW) AND !TRG AND !SCD_NK")%> <%=odiRef.getColList("and	","[COL_NAME]	= 1","
and	","","SCD_FLAG")%> <%=odiRef.getColList("and	","[COL_NAME]	= to_date ('01-01-2400', 'mm-dd-yyyy')","
and	","","SCD_END")%> )
